snippet: Clippers coach Doc Rivers' eyes welled with tears and he became choked up before his team played Portland in Game 5 of their first-round series....
lead_paragraph: Clippers coach Doc Rivers' eyes welled with tears and he became choked up before his team played Portland in Game 5 of their first-round series.

headline.main: Doc Rivers Brought to Tears in Pregame Interview Session
